SELECT mem.date_str as skey , COUNT(mem.date_str) as val FROM ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(REGDATE, '%Y-%m-%d') as date_str FROM MEMBER WHERE GENDER = '남'
AND REGDATE > DATE_ADD(sysdate(), INTERVAL -7 DAY) AND REGDATE <= sysdate()
ORDER BY REGDATE ) mem group by mem.date_str

SELECT mem.date_str as skey , COUNT(mem.date_str) as val FROM ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(REGDATE, '%Y-%m-%d') as date_str FROM MEMBER WHERE GENDER = '여'
AND REGDATE > DATE_ADD(sysdate(), INTERVAL -7 DAY) AND REGDATE <= sysdate()
ORDER BY REGDATE ) mem group by mem.date_str

SELECT ct.num as skey , IFNULL(ai.val, 0) as val FROM ( SELECT '1' as num FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '2' as num FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '3' as num FROM DUAL ) ct left join ( SELECT PAYMENT_PROC_CD as skey , COUNT(PRODUCT_CD) as val FROM auctioninfo WHERE PAYMENT_PROC_CD IN ('1', '2', '3') GROUP BY PAYMENT_PROC_CD ) ai ON ct.num = ai.skey
